name: Strike
desc: 15% chance to deal 150% DMG when attacking

name: Double Shot
desc: 25% chance to shoot 2 arrows at once when attacking

name: Mini Spell
desc: 20% chance to deal 250% DMG to enemies within range when attacking

name: Smash
desc: Applies CRIT hit on every 3 attacks

name: Snowball
desc: Attacks reduce the enemy's MOV SPD by 20% for 3s

name: Inspire
desc: 15% chance to increases nearby allies' ATK by 20% for 5s when attacking

name: Daze
desc: 15% chance to stun the enemy for 0.8s when attacking

name: Shatter Armor
desc: 35% chance to make the enemy take 20% more damage for 5s when attacking

name: Boom Fist
desc: 15% chance to deal 270% DMG to enemies within range when attacking

name: Bounty
desc: 10% chance to gain 1 gem when attacking

name: Bone Shard
desc: Deals 150% DMG to 5 enemies within range every 3s

name: Plagueburst
desc: 18% chance to deal 500% DMG to enemies within range when attacking

name: Command
desc: Increases all allies' ATK SPD by 20%

name: Longshot
desc: Fires 3 arrows every 2s,each dealing 500% DMG

name: Sword Rain
desc: 15% chance to deal 1000% DMG to enemies within range when attacking

name: Ashen Aura
desc: Enemies within attack range take 20% more damage

name: Burning Spirit
desc: Killing an enemy grants double ATK for 2s

name: Blazing Fist
desc: 15% chance to stun the enemy for 2s when attacking

name: Bloodrage
desc: Increases ATK SPD by 5% for 5s per enemy killed,stacking up to 5 times

name: Cleaving Axe
desc: The 5th attack becomes a guaranteed critical hit dealing area damage

name: Bountiful Harvest
desc: At the end of each wave, 30% chance to gain 5 golds

name: 圆桌精神
desc: Increases all allies' ATK by 10%,Critical Rate by 5%

name: 英雄斩击
desc: 攻击时，15%概率生成一道剑气，对剑气上的敌人造成攻击力1500%的伤害，并附加30%的减速效果，持续5s

name: 石中剑
desc: 自身暴伤增加50%，装备的剑类武器等级越高提升越大，10级为200%

name: Soulflare
desc: Increases ATK by +10 for each enemy killed

name: Candlehold
desc: 10% chance to deal 2000% DMG to enemies within range and immobilize them for 3s when attacking

name: Warpflame
desc: Every 10s, summons 4 twisted matter that last for 5s, dealing 600% DMG and slowing enemies by 20% on contact

name: 祝福诗
desc: 我方单位攻击增加5%，攻速增加5%，暴伤增加5%

name: 爱的庇护
desc: 场上敌人数量大于80时，立即减少至60（生效一次）

name: 心灵共振
desc: 攻击时，15%概率随机强化一名我方单位。攻击+10%，暴击+5%，持续5s

name: Cower
desc: Reduces all enemies' MOV SPD by 10%

name: Harvest Soul
desc: 10% chance to instantly kill a non-full health enemy (does not affect elites and bosses)

name: Phantom Sweep
desc: 15% chance to deal 1000% DMG to enemies within range when attacking

name: 巨龙降临
desc: 成功召唤时，对所有敌人造成攻击力3000%的伤害

name: 护巢意识
desc: 场上敌人数量大于50时，攻击提升20%

name: 深渊咆哮
desc: 攻击时，10%概率对范围内的敌人造成攻击力1500%的伤害，并追加其最大生命值10%的伤害

name: 火焰吐息
desc: 每攻击20次，喷射三个火球，每个火球对范围内的敌人造成攻击力2500%的伤害

name: 响指
desc: 每波WAVE开始时5%的概率消灭一半敌人

name: 时间掌控
desc: 每波WAVE时长增加3s

name: 无限
desc: 每8s触发一次，普攻将替换为攻击力1000%的范围伤害，直到有敌人阵亡
